content.rendered:
Creator Anya Reiss

Directed by Justin Chadwick. Udayan Prasad. Catherine Morshead

Written by Anya Reiss. Emily Ballou. Suhayla El-Bushra. Anna Jordan

Cast Alicia von Rittberg( Elizabeth Tudor8 episodes, 2022 ). John Heffernan( Duke of Somerset8 episodes, 2022 ). Oliver Zetterström( Edward VI8 episodes, 2022 ). Jamie Parker( John Dudley8 episodes, 2022 ). Romola Garai( Mary Tudor8 episodes, 2022 ). Leo Bill( Henry Grey8 episodes, 2022 ). Ekow Quartey( Pedro8 episodes, 2022 ). Tom Cullen( Thomas Seymour7 episodes, 2022 ). Jacob Avery( Guildford Dudley7 episodes, 2022 ). Jamie Blackley( Robert Dudley7 episodes, 2022 ). Alexandra Gilbreath( Kat Ashley6 episodes, 2022 ). Bella Ramsey( Jane Grey6 episodes, 2022 ). Alex Macqueen( Bishop Gardiner6 episodes, 2022 ). Jessica Raine( Catherine Parr5 episodes, 2022 ). Ryan Nolan( Richard3 episodes, 2022 ). Olivier Huband( Guzmán de Silva3 episodes, 2022 ). Ruby Ashbourne Serkis( Amy Robsart3 episodes, 2022 ). Stanley Townsend( Anthony Denny2 episodes, 2022 ). Ben Moor( Doctor2 episodes, 2022 ). Alfie Todd( Edward Seymour2 episodes, 2022 ). Robert Whitelock( Robert Kett2 episodes, 2022 ). Oliver Bennett( Court Physician1 episode, 2022 ). Beth Goddard( Joan Denny1 episode, 2022 ). Erin Ainsworth( Denny’s Daughter1 episode, 2022 ). Luke Rollason( King’s Player1 episode, 2022 ). Nicholas Bishop( French Ambassador1 episode, 2022 ). Tom Morley( Catholic Priest1 episode, 2022 ). Martin Bassindale( King’s Player1 episode, 2022 ). Poppy Shepherd( Peasant Woman1 episode, 2022 ). Derek Lea( English Soldier1 episode, 2022 ). Matthew Steer( William1 episode, 2022 ). Adam Sopp( Gentleman Usher1 episode, 2022 ). Miltos Yerolemou( Tutor1 episode, 2022 ). Ed Eales White( Villager1 episode, 2022 ). Bo Poraj( John Robsart1 episode, 2022 ). Shaun Mason( Priest1 episode, 2022 ). Lucy Speed( Elizabeth Robsart1 episode, 2022 ). Michael Webber( Yeoman Guard1 episode, 2022 ). Kenny Fullwood( Messenger1 episode, 2022 ). Nicholas Page Hayman( London Towns Folk (uncredited)3 episodes, 2022 ). Richard Lloyd-Knight( Whitehall Noble (uncredited)1 episode, 2022)

Language English

Producers Anya Reiss. George Faber. George Ormond. Lisa Osborne. George Ormond

Production The Forge.

Certificate 18+

Season 1

Episodes 8
